column1: Gimbi is a town in western Ethiopia. Located in the West Welega Zone of the Oromia Region
column2: it has a latitude and longitude of 9°10′N 35°50′E with an elevation between 1845 and 1930 meters above sea level. It is the administrative center of Gimbi woreda.
